description:
OpenAI has added its voice to the growing chorus of tech leaders and politicians opposing a controversial AI safety bill in California. The company argues that the legislation, SB 1047, would stifle innovation and that regulation should be handled at a federal level. In a letter sent to California State Senator Scott Wiener’s office, OpenAI... Read more »

The post OpenAI warns California’s AI bill threatens US innovation appeared first on AI News.
title: OpenAI warns California’s AI bill threatens US innovation

description:
The rise of the creator economy was one of the most disruptive forces to emerge from the internet, paving the way for independent writers, artists, musicians, podcasters, YouTubers and social media influencers to connect with audiences directly and earn money from doing so.  Creators have flocked to platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Vimeo, Substack, TikTok... Read more »

The post As AI improves, what does it mean for user-generated content? appeared first on AI News.
title: As AI improves, what does it mean for user-generated content?
